localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Archimedes is the investment learning hub for everyone. Make investing a bigger part of your life by learning from a personal curriculum of bite-sized lessons, fun gameplay, and from a trusted community. Sign up and become a better investor today.
nodes.title: Archimedes - Investment learning hub for everyone
nodes.author: Clair Byrd

nodes.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
nodes.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
nodes.author: Ilia Maksimenka

nodes.excerpt: pNeura is a platform that enables entrepreneurs to share their progress and connect with other entrepreneurs and investors. Investors can follow their portfolios with ease. Developed by Appello Software.
nodes.title: pNeura - Entrepreneurs Network - EXPLORE STARTUPS AND FOUNDERS
nodes.author: Michelle Badenhorst

nodes.title: FundBoard - Build a tailor-fit list of startup investors in minutes

nodes.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
nodes.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: ClearAngel gives the early stage founders access to capital, data-driven advice, and Clearbancâ€™s expansive network
nodes.title: ClearAngel by Clearbanc - Data-driven angel investment & advice, without a rich uncle
nodes.author: Andrew D'Souza

nodes.excerpt: Did you know that you would be a millionaire today if you have invested $83 per month into the NASDAQ 100 since 1985? Calculate and plan now your personal investment scenario. Download the https://www.growthmillionaire.com/calc/ğŸŒ± https://www.growthmillionaire.com/calc/ğŸ’° https://www.growthmillionaire.com/calc/ğŸ”¢ https://www.growthmillionaire.com/calc/ for free.

nodes.excerpt: Pick stocks with your peers. ClosingBell tracks the performance of picks posted online to discover the top rated stocks by the people who correctly pick winners most of the time.
nodes.title: ClosingBell 2.0 - Collaboratively pick stocks with thousands of traders
nodes.author: Scott

nodes.excerpt: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!
nodes.title: Alinea - Invest in stocks you believe in
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Lendtable gives employees the cash to max out their full 401(k) match and employee stock purchase plan (ESPP). Sign up in 3 minutes to start earning thousands of dollars a year from your employee benefits.
nodes.title: Lendtable - We give you the money to max out your employee benefits
nodes.author: Nathan Baschez

nodes.excerpt: Tiny stocks watcher for the menu bar. Add your favorite tickers to always see the current price. Powered by Yahoo Finance API. Buy on the Mac App Store for $0.99 or free install via Xcode. For any further information or features, feel free to contact me.
nodes.title: Market Bar - Tiny stocks watcher
nodes.author: Daniil M.

nodes.excerpt: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. â € It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
nodes.title: Stonksfolio - Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Watch for GME squeeze updates!
nodes.title: Is The Squeeze Squoze? - Is GME Squoze Yet?
nodes.author: Jeff Needles

nodes.excerpt: In case you haven't (jk, everyone has heard)... --------- Simple site showing which brokerages are allowing/blocking trading for certain apps so you figure out where you want to move your money too
nodes.title: Can I Trade It? - Which brokerages let you trade $GME, $NOK, $BB, $AMC, etc..
nodes.author: Connor Van Ooyen

nodes.excerpt: We bought likely 2024 presidential candidates URLs. We broke each URL into 100 shares that we are now selling for $1 per share. You buy shares of the URLs you want, and if we sell it you get a cut of the money.
nodes.title: In The Year 2024 - We have future presidents' domains - buy shares and get paid
nodes.author: Daniel Greenberg

nodes.excerpt: The Orbit Shift Podcast is an initiative by Freshworks for Startups to help startups scale. We bring you practical advice from the worldâ€™s leading experts to help make better decisions across business functions such as sales, marketing, management, and so on.
nodes.title: The Orbit Shift Podcast - Practical insights for startups looking to scale.
nodes.author: Jayadevan PK

nodes.excerpt: A free app that helps founders manage their investor courting process. If you know a founder raising capital or plan to do so yourself one day, this is a must. We are offering FounderZ created on our platform FREE to anyone starting a business this year.
nodes.title: FounderZ - Free app for founders to manage the fund raising process
nodes.author: Sridhar Machiroutu

nodes.excerpt: Laguna lets you create an up-to-date personal page for your stock trades and holdings. Perfect for keeping your fin-friends & family updated, building your influencer following, dropping in your linktr.ee, or using for your fintech newsletter.
nodes.title: Laguna - OnlyFans for your stock portfolio
nodes.author: Gideon Tay Yee Chuen

nodes.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
nodes.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett
nodes.author: Younghwi Cho

nodes.excerpt: Bitbo is a real-time Bitcoin dashboard that allows anyone to monitor on-chain data, view live price action, and track key economic indicators - all for free.
nodes.title: Bitbo - Real-time Bitcoin dashboard
nodes.author: Christopher Gimmer

nodes.excerpt: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
nodes.title: Fundraising Hours - Remotely connecting founders with committed investors
nodes.author: Shun Yamada

nodes.excerpt: Easy-to-understand smart-insight investment tool that innovates the trading market, brings together investing education resources with coolest designs for Millennials and Gen Z.
nodes.title: Qooore - Investing app for hypebeasts
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Discover aggregate data on average startup valuations and revenue multipliers in 55 industry groups, based on real data sourced from 200,000+ deals. Learn who are the top VC investors in rounds like yours.
nodes.title: Startup Valuation Nest - Check startup valuations and multipliers in your industry
nodes.author: Anna Scherbak

nodes.excerpt: Fuel fund showcases selected startups to 1000s of handpicked investors in the US. Think of it as a fund's demo day but asynchronous and massively scalable. When a startup lists on wantfuel.com, we forward their details to almost 5000+ investors on our rolodex.
nodes.title: Fuel Fund - List your startup and get discovered by 1000s of investors
nodes.author: Sid
